channel.title: CVE Feed for Session -- Session
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Session -- Session

item.title: CVE-2024-2045|2024-07-26T17:52:53.454Z -- session -- session
item.description:
Session version 1.17.5 allows obtaining internal application files and public
files from the user's device without the user's consent. This is possible
because the application is vulnerable to Local File Read via chat attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-2045|2024-02-29T23:37:37.339Z -- session -- session

Session version 1.17.5 allows obtaining internal application files and public
